name: Mark: Uprising
description:
A murder mystery involving scientists, childhood friends, and... robots?

How to Play

  • Move using W,A,S,D or the directional keys on the keyboard.
  • Interact with Interactable Objects and Advance Dialogue with F.  
  • Select Dialogue Choices or Inventory Item with the Left-Mouse Button.
  • Load the Accusation Screen with R.

Team

Matt Bonnecaze - Lead Programmer (Dialogue System, Inventory)

Zhengtong Chen - Lead Sound Design, Ass. Programmer (Inventory, Accusation System), Lead UI Designer

Emily McNee - Co-Narrative Designer, Lead Music, Ass. Sound Design, Project Manager

John Ray - Co-Narrative Designer, Lead Prop Artist, Lead Scenic Designer

Leon Zhou - Lead Character Artist, Lead Character Animator
